effect.shortEffect: Absorbs grass moves, raising Attack one stage.
effect.full: Whenever a grass-type move hits this Pok√©mon, its Attack rises one stage, negating any other effect on it.

description.black-white: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.
description.black-2-white-2: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.
description.x-y: Boosts the Attack stat when hit by a Grass-type move.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Boosts the Attack stat when hit by a Grass-type move.
description.sun-moon: Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move, instead of taking damage.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move, instead of taking damage.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move instead of taking damage.
description.sword-shield: Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move instead of taking damage.
